item.title: Starter command
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Sonis, post:3, topic:168221”]no… do this.

look for} else if (File1 == false && File2 == false) {

make it look like this:

} else if (File1 == false && File2 == false) { addItem(995, 20000000); misc.println(playerName+": character file not found."); return 3; }

AUTO new accounts get 20m

some servers don’t have starter(int) initiated in the save/load file…[/quote]

Lol.

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:2, topic:168221”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 10000000); sendMessage("Spend this wisely!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Already got your starter, noob -.-"); } }

change where it says 955, 10000000 and make it what u want its 10m atm[/quote]

This way is better.

Just declare the int

public static int starter;

Read full topic

@Sonis wrote:

no… do this.

look for} else if (File1 == false && File2 == false) {

make it look like this:

} else if (File1 == false && File2 == false) { addItem(995, 20000000); misc.println(playerName+": character file not found."); return 3; }

AUTO new accounts get 20m

some servers don’t have starter(int) initiated in the save/load file…
